txt.en: 'Angmar will find the women of the Trév Gállorg to be far from defenceless.'
'If you travel to the east, beware Rammas Deluon, the stone guardians of Angmar.'
'We will stand always against the Trév Duvárdain and their masters in Carn Dûm!'
'We have not heard from Golodir the Ranger. The men say he is a coward.'
'The Iron Crown grows stronger with every day that passes.'
'Crannog has been chieftain of the Trév Gállorg for many years.'
'You bring news from Gath Forthír? I fear that the Rangers have left us to face our plight alone.'
'The Uruks slew many of our brothers. Even so, we will not surrender.'
